Package org.apache.solr.request

Interface Summary
BinaryQueryResponseWriter Deprecated. use org.apache.solr.response.BinaryQueryResponseWriter
QueryResponseWriter Deprecated. use org.apache.solr.response.QueryResponseWriter
SolrQueryRequest Container for a request to execute a query.
SolrRequestHandler Implementations of SolrRequestHandler are called to handle query requests.
